live_updates: Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve the issue. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39697.summary: Some customers in the Valhalla area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39697.title: July 16 – Winnipeg (Valhalla) | All Services - Outage (Fix in progress)
